block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: NeoPixel需要初始化才能运行 - 设置连接到 neopixel 的 Pin - 设置LED数量 NeoPixel need to be initialize before it can operate - set the Pin connected to neopixel - set the number of LED
将所有 Neopixel 设置为选定的颜色 - 只影响定义的 LED 数量 set all the neopixel to selected color - only affect number of LED defined

custom-block.comment: fill all LED with selected color

scripts.comment: 设置所有像素的 RGB 颜色 - RGB 的值为十六进制的 RRGGBB set RGB color of all pixels - value of RGB is RRGGBB in hexademical
使用色轮获得具有多个步骤的完整颜色范围 - 12 / 18 / 24 / 36 steps use Color Wheel to get a full color range with number of steps - 12 / 18 / 24 / 36 steps
使用色轮获得具有多个步骤的完整颜色范围 - 12 / 18 / 24 / 36 steps use Color Wheel to get a full color range with number of steps - 12 / 18 / 24 / 36 steps
另一个例子 another an example

custom-block.comment: - 默认亮度为 50 default brightness is 50

scripts.comment: 设置LED亮度 - 1 至 255 - 默认亮度为 50 set brightness of LED - 1 to 255 - default brightness is 50
需要运行此命令来停止运行的 LED need to run this to stop the running LED
设置所选像素数的颜色并以秒为单位延迟运行 - 它将永远运行 set color of number of pixel selected and run with delay in seconds - it will run forever
设置选定 Neopixel 的 RGB 颜色 - RGB 的值为十六进制的 RRGGBB set RGB color of selected number of pixel - value of RGB is RRGGBB in hexademical
